ingredients.ingredient: 1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
2 (14.5 ounce) cans Mexican-style stewed tomatoes, undrained
1 (6 ounce) package uncooked long grain and wild rice mix, with seasoning packet
1 (12 ounce) package fully cooked hot Italian sausage, cut into 1/4-inch thick slices
1 pound raw small shrimp, shelled and deveined

cookingTips: Sauté the holy trinity (onion, peppers, garlic) until softened to build a flavorful base
Add sausage early to infuse the broth with its smoky, spicy flavors
Add shrimp in the last 5 minutes of cooking to prevent overcooking and maintain tenderness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Creole-style gumbo skips the traditional roux for a lighter approach. How would you adjust the spice level if your guests prefer milder flavors?
